species.name: floette
descriptions: It flutters around fields of flowers and cares for flowers that are starting to wilt. It draws out the hidden power of flowers to battle.
It gives its own power to flowers, pouring its heart into caring for them. Floette never forgives anyone who messes up a flower bed.
It raises flowers and uses them as weapons. The more gorgeous the blossom, the more power it contains.
When the flowers of a well-tended flower bed bloom, it appears and celebrates with an elegant dance.

abilities.name: flower-veil
abilities.effect: Protects friendly grass Pokémon from having their stats lowered by other Pokémon.

abilities.name: symbiosis
abilities.effect: Passes the bearer's held item to an ally when the ally uses up its item.
